All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Activity
Abstract class that contains code for both Course and Event Classes for easier readability and usage of larger code.
ArrayList<E>
This is a the custom arraylist class.
ArrayQueue<E>
This is the Array Queue class that helps us construct a queue using a array list.
ArrayStack<E>
This is the Stack implemented using ArrayLists.
Conflict
Interface to ensure that the conflict methods are implemented
ConflictException
For conflicting activities, this is a custom class
Course
Course class for PackScheduler.
CourseCatalog
CourseCatalog used to manage courses
CourseCatalogPanel
Creates a user interface for working with the CourseCatalog.
CourseNameValidator
Course Name Validator class for validating course names.
CourseNameValidatorFSM
Finite State Machine for checking whether a Course's Name is valid.
CourseRecordIO
Reads Course records from text files.
CourseRoll
CourseRoll class that helps a student enroll, drop and checks that ensure that a student can enroll in a class This class uses various methods to ensure that the student is added to the class or to the waitlist and the order in which the student will be added from the waitlist.
InvalidTransitionException
For conflicting activities, this is a custom class

LinkedQueue<E>
This is the LinkedQueue class that helps us construct a queue using a linked list.
LinkedStack<E>
This is the Stack implemented using a LinkedList.
PackSchedulerGUI
Main GUI for the PackScheduler project.
Queue<E>
This is the Queue interface that contains 5 generic methods for both ArrayList queue and the LinkedList queue
RegistrationManager
The `RegistrationManager` class manages course registration and user authentication in a university system.
Schedule
Schedule class
Stack<E>
This is the stack interface that is implemented by the ArrayList and LinkedList
Student
Represents an individual Student record Will handle the Student firstName, lastName, id, email, password, and max credits Implements Comparable to compare two Students to correctly order them
StudentDirectory
Maintains a directory of all students enrolled at NC State.
StudentDirectoryPanel
Creates a user interface for working with the StudentDirectory.
StudentRecordIO
Provides static methods that support reading in student records from a file and writing student records to a file
StudentRegistrationPanel
Creates a user interface for students to register for classes.
